title: Replace selected Berthing page sections with grouped infrastructure cards

requirements.text: In the Berthing page content area, replace the UI content rendered under both selected elements (`/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]` and `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]`) with a structured display of the provided `infrastructure` object, grouped by category and rendered as card-based sections.

quotes: it should  fully replaced with the entire infrastructure object you provided, data be displayed as structured cards (like the tugboats), yes as separate grouped sections in ui

acceptanceCriteria: The existing content currently rendered in the selected Berthing page sections is no longer visible (e.g., Port metadata/KPIs table, berthing points viewer/filter UI, etc., if those are what currently occupy the selected DOM nodes).
The replacement UI renders exactly these four group sections (as visible headings): `terminal_3_mps`, `main_harbour_quays`, `specialized_industrial`, `tema_shipyard`.
Each group section renders one card per entry in that group, using consistent card styling across groups.

Cards display the fields from the provided object clearly with English labels: for terminal_3_mps show berth, draft, type; for main_harbour_quays show berth, quay, draft; for specialized_industrial show name, location, draft, cargo; for tema_shipyard show dock, dimensions, capacity, primary_use.
Layout is responsive: cards flow in a grid on wider screens and a single column on narrow screens.

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the two selected elements identified by the provided XPath expressions; do not change unrelated parts of the UI outside those DOM regions.
Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or any other `frontend.immutablePaths` listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not implement or modify tugboat cards in this change (even if discussed earlier), unless they are within the selected XPath elements.
Do not add new filters, berth viewer features, or additional datasets beyond the provided `infrastructure` object.
